actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Nutrition and Investigations.

official_title: A bill to amend the National School Lunch Act to modify the criteria for determining whether a private organization providing nonresidential day care services is considered an institution under the child care food program, and for other purposes.
subjects: Federal aid to day care centers

summary.text: Amends the National School Lunch Act to make a private organization providing nonresidential day care services eligible for aid under the child care food program if at least 25 percent of the individuals it serves are eligible for free or reduced price lunches under specified provisions of such Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National School Lunch Act to modify the criteria for determining whether a private organization providing nonresidential day care services is considered an institution under the child care food program, and for other purposes.
